New Records: Andries Gous and Harmeet Singh put on 91 runs for the sixth wicket, the second-highest partnership for the sixth wicket in all T20Is
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored 74 runs, his highest score of the T20 World Cup
Aiden Markram was dismissed by Corey Anderson on the stroke of the final five overs
Kagiso Rabada held the length back, the ball caught the splice of Steven Taylor's bat and popped up to Heinrich Klaasen at mid-off
Corey Anderson took the skier off Saurabh Netravalkar to end Reeza Hendricks' knock
Pre-Game Insights: The USA players sweat it out ahead of their Super Eight fixture against South Africa
Aiden Markram was South Africa's under-19 captain when they won the age-group World Cup 10 years ago and he may think his time has come
Post-Match Reflections: USA finished on 176 for 6, 18 runs short
The game was lost with ball in hand with five USA bowlers conceding 148 runs in 12 overs and not building on the work of the other two
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA fielding has been exceptional thus far
Corey Anderson took a skier to dismiss Reeza Hendricks
Shayan Jahangir was on the boundary at cow corner and judged his catch to dismiss Quinton de Kock well
Ali Khan was excellent on the deep point boundary, to take the catch that removed Aiden Markram, running forward
Others: The match was played on a batter-friendly surface
South Africa's attack has defended far less in the tournament so far
The USA bowlers were unable to restrict the South African batters, particularly Heinrich Klaasen and Tristan Stubbs
